channel.title: Can someone make me an autodropper?
channel.description: Please can somebody make me an autodropper where I can set the colours of the item to be dropped and it will drop all of the items of that colour in my inventory? :D I would really apreciate if it if someone could make one for me. ;)

item.title: Can someone make me an autodropper?
item.dc:creator: @eggi4792 eggi4792
item.description:
@eggi4792 wrote:

well i was just basically saying that i am a massive script noob and i have tried to learn but i just don’t understand it in the slightest, it’s a different language for me.

Read full topic

Im 15
Starblaster is 15 I think

item.source: Can someone make me an autodropper?

item.title: Can someone make me an autodropper?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I fixed the script a little bit. Because colors are not dependable, I added the IsUpText.
Just make sure you don’t choose any capitol letters.

[code]program Dropper;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
var
dropped:Integer;

const
ItemColor = 1406123; //the color of the item in your inv
ItemTolerance = 2; //the higher, the less accurate the color needs ot be
ItemName = ‘rimp’; //change this to 3 letters out of the name in the top left. Don’t use capitols.

Procedure DropIt;
begin
Dropped:=0;
repeat
if(FindColorTolerance(x,y,ItemColor,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2,MIY2,ItemTolerance))then
begin
wait(100)
MMouse(x,y,2,2);
if(IsUpText(ItemName))then
begin
GetMousePos(x,y);
Mouse(x,y,1,1,false);
Wait(200+ random(100));
ChooseOption(x,y,‘rop’);
Dropped:=Dropped+1;
end;
end;
until not (FindColorTolerance(x,y,ItemColor,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2,MIY2,ItemTolerance))
Writeln(‘Dropped ’ +inttostr(Dropped) +’ "’+itemname +’"s. Terminating script.’)
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
DropIt;
TerminateScript;
end.[/code]

also you had invalid parameters in the ChooseOption.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone make me an autodropper?

item.title: Can someone make me an autodropper?
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

This? I just typed it up from scratch really quickly.

[code]program Dropper;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

const
ItemColor = 00000; //the color of the item in your inv
ItemTolerance = 3; //the higher, the less accurate the color needs ot be

Procedure DropIt;
begin
repeat
FindColorTolerance(x,y,ItemColor,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2,MIY2,ItemTolerance)
Wait(100+ random(100));
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, False);
Wait(200 + random(100));
ChooseOption(‘rop’);
until not (FindColorTolerance(x,y,ItemColor,MIX1, MIY1, MIX2,MIY2,ItemTolerance))
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
DropIt;
end;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone make me an autodropper?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

A color is just not good enough in Runescape.
Could you tell me what it is you want to drop? Also, if you’re bothering with auto dropping, why not just auto the whole skill? It’s easier to just drop items yourself than it is to auto.
